generateLTI10FormData(key, secret, url, ret_url, context, lesson, user, manager, assignment) → {Object}

Generate LTI 1.0 Launch Form Data
Parameters:
Name Type Description
key string the consumer key for the LTI tool
secret string the consumer secret for the LTI tool
url string the URL to launch the LTI tool
ret_url string the return URL for the LTI tool
context Object the context for the LTI launch (course)
lesson Object the lesson for the LTI launch
user Object the user launching the LTI tool
manager boolean true if the user is a course manager, else false
assignment Object the assignment for the LTI launch
